title: A new idea for LEAVERS ~ Way to earn IP
body:
Hi guys,
So basically leavers are quite common in LoL and we all have to do it from time to time.
My idea is to give a team a **chance to *win with an afk.***

Say a player left a game
They don't come back within 5 minutes
This gives the team the option to* "kick them"* from the game
The champion and other information about who the leaver was playing (spells, etc) will be shown randomly to people joining a queue called "fill"
The person then accepts or declines to play this game. If they decline they have to wait 20 minutes before trying again (deter cheating the system)
This queue is basically a way to make IP as no matter if you win or lose you get an amount according to if the team you are filling liked you
*50IP* for each vote at end game. (This will deter bots, etc)

If the player that went afk tries to rejoin the current player that took over will get a message to let them take over again or not
If they let them take over again there will still be a vote at end game to give them IP

Just an idea,
Wondering what you all thought

replies.body: Possibly, if they get to choose their own champs and join the left off queue, this would be a great idea.

I like the idea, I just don't think many people would use it. You don't get an awful lot of people thinking "You know what? I want to join a game someone else has left". It may make few games with a leaver better but, for the most part, there probably wont be a difference.
